name: ClamKnight
description:
For many centuries, Summerland’s children have been told about the legend of the ClamKnight.

Three intrepid warriors were known for defending the Bikini Beach’s castle from the Crabbers and other evil creatures who wanted to invade it every summer.

The ClamKnight were defeated in their last battle by an even larger and stronger army.
Since then, these creatures roam freely around the castle.

Despite being just a boy, Marvin always wanted to become the new ClamKnight and retake the control of the castle.  Armed with his inseparable mop, he decided to enter the passages of the fortress and begin his adventure.

INFORMATION:

  • Styled Pixelart like SEGA Master System II
  • Retro instructions Manual included (PDF)
  • 17 amazing puzzle levels
  • Enemies and traps
  • 2 DIFFERENT ENDINGS!
